self_assess.description: Does patient feel that they can be described as healthy at this time?

self_condition.description: If patient answered NO to healthy self assessment question, describe the medical conditions they are under now.

abdominal_pain.description: Is patient currently suffering from abdominal pain?

acute_dis.description: Has patient suffered from an acute disease? If YES, provide details (e.g. I had a cold on 01/02/2012 and recovered on 01/07/2012; I receievd a heart surgery on 02/12/2012).

arthralgia.description: In the past 24 hours, has patient experienced arthralgia (joint pain)?

cancer.description: Has patient been diagnosed with cancer? If YES, provide details (e.g. I had a cold on 01/02/2012 and recovered on 01/07/2012; I receievd a heart surgery on 02/12/2012).

cancer_mtc.description: Has patient been diagnosed with Medullary Thyroid Cancer, or Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia Type 2 (Men2)?

chest_pain.description: Is patient currently suffering from chest pain?

claudication.description: Is patient currently suffering from claudication (cramping pain in leg)?

chronic_dis.description: Has patient suffered from a chronic disease? If YES, provide details (e.g. I had a cold on 01/02/2012 and recovered on 01/07/2012; I receievd a heart surgery on 02/12/2012).

diarrhea.description: In past two weeks, has patient experienced diarrhea?

dyspnea.description: Is patient currently suffering from dyspnea (difficult or labored breathing)?

ery_nodosum.description: In the past 24 hours, has patient experienced erythema nodosum (a specific type of skin inflammation)?

fever.description: Has patient suffered from fever? If YES, provide details (e.g. I had a cold on 01/02/2012 and recovered on 01/07/2012; I receievd a heart surgery on 02/12/2012).

leg_edema.description: Is patient currently suffering from leg edema (swelling)?

neurologic.description: Has a neurological exam been performed?

preg_plans.description: Does patient plan to become pregnant?

pyo_gangrenosum.description: In the past 24 hours, has patient experienced pyoderma gangrenosum related ulcers?

rash.description: Is patient currently experiencing a rash?

stool_blood.description: Does patient currently have blood in their stool.

stool_soft.description: Number of liquid or very soft stools in the past 24 hours

surgery.description: Has patient undergone surgery? If YES, provide details (e.g. I had a cold on 01/02/2012 and recovered on 01/07/2012; I receievd a heart surgery on 02/12/2012).

uveitis.description: In the past 24 hours, has patient experienced uveitis (a form of eye inflammation)?

weight_change.description: Has patient suffered from weight gain or loss? If YES, provide details (e.g. I had a cold on 01/02/2012 and recovered on 01/07/2012; I receievd a heart surgery on 02/12/2012).

diag_other.description: Has patient been diagnosed with some other disorder? If YES, provide details (e.g. I had a cold on 01/02/2012 and recovered on 01/07/2012; I receievd a heart surgery on 02/12/2012).

hosp.description: In past two weeks, has patient been hospitalized?

work_missed.description: If patient has been physically ill, how many days of work were missed?
